title: Naomi Chou
text:
Work Experience

Data Analyst, Roadrunners Venture Studios
Los Angeles, CA  February 2024 - Present 

Leading an extensive web scraping operation via Excel, Python, and R to collect over 10,000 publications and profiles related to 3D printing and additive manufacturing, efficiently storing and organizing findings in a custom database on AWS S3
Conducting in-depth data analysis of the scraped datasets using NumPy and Pandas to identify optimal 3D printing technologies for Fab AI, a Roadrunners Venture Studios co-founded company merging 3D printing with prompt engineering



Data Science/AI Engineer, Spade AI
Brooklyn, NY  February 2024 - Present 

Elevating generative AI models by integrating prompt engineering with Python programming, leveraging the OpenAI API to improve content accuracy and quality significantly
Developing a Python-powered chat interface to deliver precise market intelligence insights
Utilizing Jira for project management to efficiently organize and track development tasks and collaborating on the expansion of product features to include competitor and risk analysis



High Performance Computing (HPC) Systems Intern, UCLA OARC
Los Angeles, CA  January 2024 - Present 

Enhancing scholarly communication by editing citations on Zotero and web scraping related publications, acknowledging the significant contributions of the UCLA Hoffman2 cluster to various research projects
Conducting comprehensive data analysis to evaluate the cluster’s impact and identify opportunities for optimization, informing future enhancements and user support strategies



STEM and Writing Tutor
Remote January 2019 - Present 

Tutored over 5 middle and high school students in (AP/non-AP) level subjects such as mathematics, statistics, and writing, offering personalized and adaptive teaching strategies
Developed and shared tailored notes and resources to clarify complex mathematical, statistical, and writing concepts, leading to significant academic improvements from an average of D+ to B+



Business Development Intern, Evyree
Los Angeles, CA  April 2023 - December 2023 

Forged strategic partnerships with 25+ businesses such as Sweetgreen to offer exclusive deals and discounts for the UCLA and upcoming Santa Monica College (SMC) student community
Orchestrated targeted digital marketing campaigns on social media platforms such as Instagram by curating 5+ customized posts to enhance brand visibility and promote customer engagement



Marketing Sales Intern, Fubon Financial Holding Co.
Taipei, Taiwan  July - September 2022 

Conducted 100+ market surveys to analyze customer needs and current trends in the healthcare industry to better cater to customers’ needs and minimize financial losses
Designed and discussed effective marketing strategies such as the creation of referral programs, resulting in an outreach of more than 50+ potential customers

title: Projects
text:

Dec 8, 2023

An interactive grid-based game in C++ (kind of like PAC-MAN)





Aug 26, 2023












IMC - Wei Good Food





An integrated marketing communications (IMC) plan for an Asian fusion snack start-up, Wei Good Food





Dec 8, 2022












Senior Project - Taiwanese History Blog





A year-long senior capstone project investigating the history of modernization in Taiwan via architecture.





Apr 30, 2021

title: Naomi Chou
text:
Hi! Welcome to my personal website.
I’m Naomi Chou, an undergraduate student at the University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) majoring in Statistics and Data Science with minors in Professional Writing and Digital Humanities. My professional interests lie in the applications of data science in business, big data analytics, and artificial intelligence (AI).
I currently work as a Data Science and AI Engineer for Spade AI, a start-up specializing in market intelligence and analysis, and a Data Analyst for Roadrunners Venture Studios, a company focused on commercializing lab technology. I also work at the UCLA Office of Advanced Research Computing as a High Performance Computing (HPC) Systems Intern.
Please do not hesitate to reach out to me via Email or LinkedIn. My most recent CV is linked here!

title: Naomi Chou
text:
Interests
In my free time, I enjoy reading science fictions and history books. I’m currently reading “The Three Body Problem” by Liu Cixin, which is an absolutely mind-blowing piece of work. I look forward to reading its sequel! Other books that I enjoy include Pride and Prejudice, the Harry Potter series, and Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind.
I also enjoy cooking and baking, with my famous dishes being Taiwanese Braised Pork rice and Banana Bread. Always looking for new recipes to try!
